review_text: The dashboard is really slow to load. Takes forever to see my analytics.
Good product overall but the reporting feature is confusing and hard to navigate.
Love the concept but crashes frequently when generating reports.
Customer support is great but the export functionality is broken.
Interface looks outdated compared to competitors. Needs a refresh.
Data accuracy is excellent but the visualization options are limited.
Wish there was a dark mode option. Eye strain after long use.
The mobile experience is terrible. Can barely use it on my phone.
Great for basic analytics but missing advanced filtering options.
Integration with our CRM keeps failing. Very frustrating.
Price is fair for what you get but performance could be better.
The onboarding process is confusing. Took me days to figure things out.
Solid tool for feedback analysis but needs real-time updates.
Sometimes the sentiment analysis seems off. Marks positive reviews as negative.
Been using for 6 months. Works ok but nothing special compared to alternatives.
